__e: Master Carlton there is something you should know before you go out on your date.
[IN NORMAL VOICE] Look, it's none of your business. Why don't you just butt out?
Because Carlton doesn't have any friends... and I'll have to dance with him.
Now let's see that big Carlton Banks smile, man.
So this is it. This is how the Carlton Banks story ends.
Carlton Banks is fine the way he is.
Carlton, you're the best man for the wedding.
Carlton, would you please tell her who I really am?
Carlton, you can't put all your money on one number.
